title: Is there any way not to get destroyed by smurfs ?
body: I do not want to complain or anything , but i am lvl 28 playing arams mostly. I tend to die a lot by people who have far superior mechanics than me and tend to belittle me ( calling me noob / trash / (low elo -> not sure what that is or what it includes , but it seems like an insult) after they have outplayed me . I am aware my mechanics are not the best and i will probably not be a challenger once i hit 30 but i'd like some advice that does not just include " hug turrets " .

replies.body:
Wait wait wait, you knew that the /command for surrendering in League was /ff before creating your first account lol

Just a curious question XD
Tbh , i learned that during lvl 16 , paired with the mighty ctrl1/2/3/4

So you used as many points as it takes to even get 2 champions and name changed?..... suspicious sounding for sure.

That said, you wont exactly beat them. Tbh vs plats and diamonds I have a bit of a hard time as well, but if you pay attention to what they are doing you can generally learn and then play better in the long run. So yes, you will likely get smashed if you are actually new.... or if you are not as good as they are period.... but you will learn how to play better if you choose to.
